snippet: The head of the International Olympic Committee inspection team, Nawal el-Moutawakel, said preparations for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics had made “a lot of progress” in the last six months but said, “The schedule remains tight.”
lead_paragraph: The head of the International Olympic Committee inspection team, Nawal el-Moutawakel, said preparations for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics had made “a lot of progress” in the last six months but said, “The schedule remains tight.”

headline.main: Olympic Preparations in Rio de Janeiro Have Made ‘a Lot of Progress’
